p: The essential oil affected the immune system, which included cellular quantity and quality, phenol oxidase activity, and the immune responses after B. bassiana and latex beadsâ€™ injection ( Figure 1, Figure 2, Figure 3 and Figure 4). Total hemocyte counts (THC), plasmatocytes and granular cells, nodule formation, and phenol oxidase activity was recorded the lowest in LC 50 both in oral and fumigation assays, respectively .
